21#ifdef HAVE_CONFIG_H
22#include <config.h>
23#endif
24
25#include <math.h>
26
27#ifdef NEED_DECLARATION_HYPOT
28 double hypot(double, double);
29#endif /* NEED_DECLARATION_HYPOT */
30
31double groff_hypot(double x, double y)
32{
33 double result = hypot(x, y);
34
35#ifdef __INTERIX
36 /* hypot() on Interix is broken */
37 if (isnan(result) && !isnan(x) && !isnan(y))
38 return 0.0;
39#endif
40
41 return result;
42}
43
